tool.name: Stanford Parser
tool.description: (standalone) Generate a constituency parse of unannotated text
tool.help:
**What it does**
Performs a constituency parse of a text in a LIF container using the `Stanford Core NLP tools <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/>`_.
**Required annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document containing:
1. `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ annotations (with part of speech) #. `PhraseStructure <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/PhraseStructure.html>`_ annotations #. `Constituent <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Constituent.html>`_ annotations)
.. class:: infomark
The parse tree can be visualized with the Brat visualizer tool.
**License**
Stanford CoreNLP is licensed under `the GNU General Public License <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/#license>`_.
